cleaned_text: Natural Meditation Professional Training and Coaching Copenhagen, Denmark 144 followers Exploring Effortless Being: Uniting Psychotherapy and Buddhist Teachings About us I offer courses, retreats and individual sessions around Mindfulness, Meditation. My courses are experimental and focus on the personal and spiritual growth of participants. The core of my approach encompasses Mindfulness, Meditation, Radiant Mind, body work and creative expression. Our work is based on a foundation of Buddhist psychology, psycho-dynamic understanding and mindful communication. Our courses, retreats and individual sessions are ideal for graduate psychotherapists, psychologists, counselors, students in training and other health professionals, aiming to bring Mindfulness and Meditation into their personal lives and work with clients. - Website - [https://www.stephanpende.com/](https://www.linkedin.com/redir/redirect?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Estephanpende%2Ecom%2F&urlhash=404P&trk=about_website) External link for Natural Meditation - Industries - Professional Training and Coaching - Company size - 1 employee - Headquarters - Copenhagen, Denmark - Type - Educational - Founded - 2009 - Specialties - Mindfulness, Meditation, Dream Work, Meditation Retreats, Supervison, Coaching, and Psychotherapy Locations - Primary Abel Cathrines
